title: Season Rewards
body: Heyo summoners it's me your favorite support. So Tl;dr My bf got me 14 days ban and I was wondering if I still get the platinum border and the victorious skin this year. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, we haven't made an official announcement about rewards this season, so I recommend you sit tight until one is made. You could bookmark the [news page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to ensure you can keep your eye out for it.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aUFkA87x,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-15T18:19:52.830+0000)
>
> As *Lew* mentioned, we haven't made an official announcement about rewards this season, so I recommend you sit tight until one is made. You could bookmark the [news page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to ensure you can keep your eye out for it.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Why in my client did it show up saying ranked rewards have been announced for ranked teams etc but I can't find the news on them?

Since we haven't announced Season Rewards yet, that message in the client was a derp moment/mistake on our part. ._.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
They still haven't told us what the requirements for end of season rewards are this year.  You'll have to wait until they make an official announcement to find out.
